original_text: And it came to pass, when the priests were come out of the holy place: (for all the priests that were present were sanctified, and did not then wait by course:
korean_text: 이 때에는 제사장들이 그 반열대로 하지 아니하고 스스로 정결하게 하고 성소에 있다가 나오매

sentences.original_text: when the priests were come out of the holy place
for all the priests that were present were sanctified
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 모든 제사장이 성결하게 되었기 때문이라

sentences.original_text: and did not then wait by course
